---@class AACache
local AACache = typesys.def.AACache {
    _aa_array = typesys.__unmanaged,
}

function AACache:__ctor()
    self._aa_array = {}
end

function AACache:release_aa_handle()
    local assets = lua_framework.assets_manager
    if not table.empty(self._aa_array) then
        for _, aa_handle in ipairs(self._aa_array) do
            assets.release(aa_handle)
        end
    end
    self._aa_array = {}
end

function AACache:add_aa_handle(aa_handle)
    table.insert(self._aa_array, aa_handle)
end
